question: Which country was officially associated with "Dayton Agreement"?
explanation: The General Framework Agreement for Peace in Bosnia and Herzegovina is also known as the Dayton Agreement or the Dayton Accords. It is a peace agreement signed in Dayton, Ohio, USA on 1 November 1995. The main purpose of this agreement was to put an end to the Bosnian War (1992-1995) and to bring peace and stability in Bosnia and Herzegovina.
